DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the long-term safety profile and the secondary objective to estimate clinical benefit of ZD1839 (gefitinib).
DOC.criteria: Provision of written informed consent to participate in the trial. Female or male aged 18 years and over. Patients with previously diagnosed cancer who have been treated with ZD1839 in a parent ZD1839 clinical trial and may benefit from continuation Known severe hypersensitivity to ZD1839 Concomitant use of phenytoin, carbamazepine, rifampicin, barbiturates, or St John's Wort. Withdrawal from a parent ZD1839 trial because of tumor progress
